author: Reuters Editorial
title: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Oil, energy stocks lift Wall St after U.S. quits Iran deal
text:
NEW YORK, May 9 (Reuters) - Wall Street rallied on Wednesday as surging oil prices boosted energy stocks following U.S. President Donald Trumpâ€™s decision the previous day to quit a nuclear deal with Iran.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 182.88 points, or 0.75 percent, to 24,543.09, the S&P 500 gained 25.88 points, or 0.97 percent, to 2,697.8 and the Nasdaq Composite added 73.00 points, or 1 percent, to 7,339.91. (Reporting by Noel Randewich Editing by Chizu Nomiyama)
